Sept. 26, 1998 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-first-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - solo cornet - Abergavenny. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
May 6, 2015, 12:39 p.m. July 3, 2020, 3:15 p.m.
1 Abergavenny Borough Band Brian Howard
2 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne
3 TATA Brass Dennis Mahoney
4 Tylorstown Band Fred J. Harris
5 Markham and District Band Bernard Williams
6 Penclawdd Brass Tony Small
7 Rogerstone Band Tim Crouter
